summary.para: Contains classes which implement the line drawing functionality of Chart and Range controls.
Contains parameters of the style used to draw a stroke line.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Drawing.StrokeStyle.DashArray

summary.para: Gets or sets a collection of values that specifies the lengths of alternating dashes and gaps.

member.value: The pattern of dashes and gaps.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Drawing.StrokeStyle.DashCap

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies the shape of each dash end.

member.value: The shape of each dash end.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Drawing.StrokeStyle.DashOffset

summary.para: Gets or sets the distance from the start of a line to the beginning of a dash pattern.

member.value: The distance from the start of a line to the beginning of a dash pattern.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Drawing.StrokeStyle.EndLineCap

summary.para: Gets or sets the cap style of the line end.

member.value: The cap style of the line end.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Drawing.StrokeStyle.LineJoin

summary.para: Gets or sets the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines.

member.value: The join style for the ends of two consecutive lines.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Drawing.StrokeStyle.MiterLimit

summary.para: Gets or sets the thickness limit of the join on a mitered corner.

member.value: The thickness limit of the join on a mitered corner.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
For internal use.

member.name: P:DevExpress.WinUI.Drawing.StrokeStyle.StartLineCap

summary.para: Gets or sets the cap style of the line’s beginning.

member.value: The cap style of the line’s beginning.

summary.para: Identifies the dependency property.
Gets or sets the stroke thickness.
Identifies the dependency property.
Gets or sets the stroke thickness multiplier.
